message: Let's split fairly, considering I'm losing value faster!
Your losses are steep, how about a slightly better deal for me this time?
Counteroffer, meeting halfway between our previous proposals
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering a better deal, but this won't last forever.
Still willing to negotiate, but don't think I'll go much lower
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with something substantial.
